summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Nego registration simplification and talent booking accept/reject flow. All tested pages render correctly without errors. Registration page shows simplified 2-step flow (role selection → form). Booking detail page shows correct client view with verification status. Talent accept/reject UI code is correctly implemented but cannot be tested without a talent user with auth credentials.
action_items: Create a test talent user with auth credentials to fully test the talent accept/reject booking flow
The seeded talent users (Adaeze, Chidinma, etc.) don't have corresponding auth.users entries, so they cannot be logged in
critical_code_review_comments: register/page.tsx: Simplified registration correctly passes role in metadata for DB trigger to handle profile creation
BookingDetailClient.tsx: Accept/Reject buttons correctly show for talents when status is verification_pending (lines 398-449)
BookingDetailClient.tsx: Mark as Completed button correctly shows for talents when status is confirmed (lines 452-505)
TalentDashboardClient.tsx: Action Required badge correctly shows for verification_pending bookings (lines 628-632)
TalentDashboardClient.tsx: Pending Action Alert correctly counts verification_pending bookings (lines 579-588)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend pages tested and working. Registration flow simplified to 2 steps. Booking detail page shows correct client view. To test talent accept/reject flow, need to create a talent user with auth credentials or use an existing talent account. The seeded talents (a1111111-...) are profile-only without auth.users entries.

verified_working.homepage: ✓ NEGO branding and hero section visible
verified_working.register_step2: ✓ Form with name, email, password fields and Create Account button
verified_working.login_page: ✓ Welcome Back title, email/password inputs, Sign In button
verified_working.dashboard_home: ✓ Welcome message, stats cards, Featured Talent section
verified_working.bookings_list: ✓ My Bookings title, filter tabs (All, Needs Verification, Confirmed, Completed, Cancelled)
verified_working.booking_detail_client: ✓ Booking Details title, Verification Required status, Verify Now button, talent info, services, Download Receipt

not_tested.talent_dashboard: Cannot test - requires talent user with auth credentials
not_tested.talent_accept_reject_flow: Cannot test - requires talent user with auth credentials
not_tested.action_required_badge: Code review confirms correct implementation but cannot visually verify
